alert.note: Alert for Northern Middlesex; Northern New Haven; Northern New London; Southern Middlesex; Southern New Haven; Southern New London (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 22 at 11:04PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of New London, Middlesex and eastern New Haven Counties through 1145 PM EDT... At 1104 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Guilford to near Groton. Movement was north at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jewett City, Meriden, Middletown, Wallingford, Norwich, New London, Guilford, Colchester, Clinton, East Hampton, Groton, Old Saybrook, Durham, Salem and Chester. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northern Middlesex; Northern New Haven; Northern New London; Southern Middlesex; Southern New Haven; Southern New London
